tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
    art_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    art_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    creation_year INT,
    acquisition_date DATE,
    provenance TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ArtPieces (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  year_created INT,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Exhibitions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  curator VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Provenance (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  art_piece_id INT REFERENCES ArtPieces(id),
  previous_owner VARCHAR(255),
  current_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  acquisition_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE museum_art_pieces (
    art_piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    artist_id INT,
    creation_year INT,
    description STRING
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPiece (
    art_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    artist VARCHAR(100),
    creation_year INT,
    acquisition_date DATE,
    provenance TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Artist (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    birth_year INT,
    death_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Exhibition (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);
